message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive price of $12000. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. It comes with a 1-year warranty and lifetime customer support. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly exceptional.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality and features you've described, $12000 is unfortunately outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $8500 for the product, which is still a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate further. I would like to offer you the product for $9500. This price includes all the features and benefits you're looking for, along with some additional perks such as expedited shipping and a personalized consultation. I hope this revised offer meets your requirements.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. However, $9500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm prepared to pay $9000 for the product. This represents a significant compromise on my end, and I believe it's a fair price that benefits both of us.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer you the product for $9200. This price includes all the features you're interested in, along with a special gift as a token of appreciation for your business. I hope this offer suits your budget and looks forward to your acceptance.

Alice, I appreciate your continued flexibility. While $9200 is getting closer to my range, it's still a bit high. I'm prepared to pay $9100 for the product. I believe this is a fair price that acknowledges the value of the product while staying within my budget. Let me know if this works for you.

Thank you for your understanding, Bob. I'm glad we're making progress. Considering your latest offer and the value of the product, I am willing to accept $9050 for the product. This price includes everything you're looking for and ensures that we both benefit from this transaction. I hope you'll find this offer acceptable and look forward to your positive response.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, and I see we're very close now. I'm prepared to pay $9000 for the product. This is the final offer I can make, as I have another option available at $8000. I hope we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. Considering the value of the product and the ongoing negotiations, I am willing to accept $9025 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise between our positions and allows us to conclude this transaction satisfactorily. I hope this offer meets your expectations and look forward to your confirmation.
